programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Django Atira Primeiro, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Django sai a procura de seu pai que teve a cabeça colocada à prêmio, e chega tarde demais, pois ele fora assassinado por um caçador de recompensas.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infância Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan é um oficial de polícia e a relação entre ambos não será nada fácil. Catlow é um ladrão, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vendê-lo em Abilene.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Indômita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Tempestade de Gelo, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando uma tempestade de inverno atinge a Carolina do Norte com a menor temperatura já registrada na história, os climatologistas começam uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar o máximo de vidas possíveis antes que o país inteiro vire gelo.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: A Batalha de Shindisi, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em eventos reais que ocorreram durante a intervenção militar russa na Geórgia em 2008.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.

programme.title: Caesar leva Joseph até Veneza para conhecer sua mentora Lisa Lisa, que começa a treiná-lo com rigor para aprender a controlar seus poderes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa diz a Joseph que ele precisa da pedra chamada Super Aja para destruir os Homens do Pilar. Joseph e Caesar enfrentam outros mestres.

programme.title: Joseph e Caesar combinam seus poderes e enfrentam o Homem do Pilar que tomou o corpo de Suzi Q para roubar a Pedra Vermelha de Aja.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.

programme.title: Caesar chega ao esconderijo do inimigo, e agora ele tem um novo tipo de ataque. Lisa Lisa revela seu passado a Joseph.

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.

programme.title: Joseph tenta impedir que Lisa Lisa sofra uma queda mortal. Speedwagon revela detalhes sobre o passado de Lisa Lisa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Pedra Vermelha deixa Kars praticamente invencível. Joseph planeja atrair Kars para um vulcão e acabar com ele por lá.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kars surge da lava derretida e ataca Joseph, que instintivamente segura a Pedra Vermelha para se proteger dos golpes do inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.

programme.title: Jotaro ignora os protestos de Joseph e tenta usar seu Stand para impedir que DIO continue controlando o cérebro de Kakyoin.

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam até Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usuário desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino é encontrado no navio.

programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.title: Algo estranho está crescendo no braço de Joseph. Quando um médico tenta retirá-lo, um rosto aparece no tumor e declara ser um Stand.

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados desconfiam que exista um Stand por perto quando encontram um cadáver em uma tranquila cidade do Paquistão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Meu Amigo Ninja, (2018, Children)
programme.desc: Em uma fábrica ilegal de bonecas na Tailândia, um empresário malvado explora crianças trabalhadoras. Após um infeliz acidente, uma boneca ganha vida e viaja para a Dinamarca, onde faz amizade com um garoto, pedindo ajuda para se vingar.

programme.title: Thor e o Fantasma Voador, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: Após a guerra, o Fantasma Voador persegue moradores. Tom, Mirjam e Sniff investigam. Com as habilidades de Sniff, o fantasma é preso e uma trama de assassinato e vingança é descoberta.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Forçado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inúmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraíso distante.

programme.title: Um Conto Sobre o Tempo, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Neste conto de fadas, Urban é um aprendiz de relojoeiro que segue os passos de seu corajoso mestre, Apbán, e parte em uma ousada jornada para encontrar um relógio com o poder de avisar a quem o possui sobre sua própria morte.

programme.title: Thor: Deus do Trovão, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: O inescrupuloso Loki escapou de Asgard e está à procura de Yggdrasil, a árvore que contém toda a força do universo. Ele planeja destruí-la e replantá-la à sua imagem e semelhança.

programme.title: As Travessuras de Uma Sereia, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um projeto de propriedade de Xuan envolvendo a recuperação do mar ameaça a subsistência das sereias que dependem do mar para sobreviver. A sereia Shan é enviada para parar Xuan e levá-lo para que faça projeto em outro local.

programme.title: Valhalla - A Lenda de Thor, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: As crianças vikings Røskva e Tjalfe embarcam em uma aventura para Valhalla com os deuses Thor e Loki. A vida em Asgard, no entanto, acaba sendo ameaçada pelo temido lobo Fenrir e pelos arqui-inimigos bárbaros dos deuses.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Children)
programme.desc: A viagem para Disney foi cancelada. Mac e seu pai, Sean, vão a uma cidade com um lago. Eles encontrarão aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguições e bandidos. Uma história de amizade para toda a família.

programme.title: Clockstoppers: O Filme, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Zak Gibbs (Jesse Bradford, "Hackers") é um adolescente normal que consegue poderes extraordinários após encontrar um relógio misterioso que pode parar o tempo!

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glória ou sucumbir à vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Prelude to Murder (in Color), (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: A trio of music boxes contains the hidden secret to riches, and a group of criminals will kill for them. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: South Pacific, (1958, Musical)

programme.title: Moulin Rouge, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for seven Academy Awards,® including Best Picture, and winner of two (1953, Best Art Direction-Set Decoration and Best Costume Design), this stunning biography of artist Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec is flawlessly directed by John Huston.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: The Pride of the Yankees, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

programme.title: Fear Strikes Out, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: True story of the life of Jimmy Piersall, who battled mental illness to achieve stardom in major league baseball.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story, (1950, Drama)

programme.title: The Bells Of St Mary's, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

programme.title: Escape Plan 3: The Extractors, (2019, Action)

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Night of the Sicario, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Natasha Henstridge (Species) stars in this action-packed thriller that will shock you at every turn. When DEA agents are ambushed by sicarios in a fatal shootout, the survivors must play a deadly game of cat and mouse to live through the night.

programme.title: Assault on VA-33, (2021, Action)

programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Gallowwalkers, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A cursed gunman (Wesley Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.

programme.title: Union Bound, (2016, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Sargent Hoover went to war to preserve the Union. After being captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp, he understood what it was to be kept against his will. Together with a friend he escaped and aided by slaves made it to freedom.

programme.title: Sweetwater, (2013, Western)
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

programme.title: Forsaken (2014), (2016, Western)
programme.desc: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father, Reverend Samuel Clayton, while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

programme.title: The Duel, (2016, Action)

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: The Private Life Of Sherlock Holmes, (1970, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a beautiful woman claims that her husband has disappeared, the investigation takes Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson to Scotland, where they uncover a plot involving a clandestine society, Her Majesty's Secret Service... and the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Avanti!, (1972, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this hilarious Billy Wilder romantic comedy, American Wendell Armbruster, Jr. (Jack Lemmon) discovers true love with the daughter of his father's secret mistress (Juliet Mills) after his father and his father's lover are killed in an accident.

programme.title: The Fortune Cookie, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: In their very first screen pairing, Walter Matthau (who would win a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his performance) and Jack Lemmon portray a crooked lawyer and his TV cameraman brother-in-law in this madcap tale of greed and recouping lost love.

programme.title: Stalag 17, (1953, War)
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy, including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: Irma La Douce, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Set in Paris' famous Red Light district, a rookie policeman (Jack Lemmon) plots to keep a beautiful prostitute (Shirley MacLaine) all to himself in this hit comedy from director Billy Wilder.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.desc: The legendary live show from the Monty Python troupe. Performing many of their greatest sketches from Monty Python's Flying Circus and two Monty Python specials, Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus, live from the Hollywood Bowl in 1980.

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail, (1975, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Grossing the highest box-office of any British film in the US when released in 1975, this "cult classic" comedy from the Monty Python team loosely follows the legend of King Arthur, along with his squire and his Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher, the rivalries never as fierce, the risks never so great. One wrong move - one card short - and it's game over for good.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: An unlikely source acts as a roadblock to give Luffy some climbing room, and Zorro emerges from a snow bank cold, cranky, and ready to rumble
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: After a long journey up the mountain, Nami finally receives much-needed medical attention, but Sanji and Luffy are more interested in eating the doctor!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ship’s doctor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!

programme.title: Chopper’s first friend was a quack doctor who couldn’t cure a cold, but the old man still managed to teach the little reindeer how to care for people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and the Will that Gets Carried On!

programme.title: Luffy unleashes the full force of his Gum Gum furry on Wapol, and Chopper is amazed by the rubberman’s fierce devotion to the pirate flag.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fight Wapol's Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!

programme.title: When Wapol orders his goons to attack the Straw Hats, Chopper shows off a little something he calls the Rumble Ball!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoan-type Devil Fruit! Chopper's Seven-form Transformation!

programme.title: Wapol attacks Nami in her weakened condition, but Monkey B. Luffy is quick to step in and even the odds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!

programme.title: After an explosive battle with Wapol, Luffy begins the tiring process of convincing Chopper to join his pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: Chopper sets sail for Alabasta with his new friends, and Dalton thinks back to his first meeting with Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!

programme.title: The Straw Hats rescue a man of many faces as they approach Alabasta. Sure, he’s good for a laugh, but they may regret pulling him out of the drink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive in Alabasta with precious little time to stop the rebellion. Sanji and Chopper are sent to gather supplies for a dangerous trip across the desert.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summoning Powder and the Rebel army!

programme.title: Captain Smoker has Luffy in his grasp until a fiery stranger creates a diversion, giving the Straw Hats a chance to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Heroes' Reunion! His Name is Fire Fist Ace!

programme.title: Ace and Luffy’s happy reunion is crudely interrupted by the Billions of Baroque Works. They may be outnumbered, but these brothers are no ordinary pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!

programme.title: Before they can start their trek across the desert, Luffy and the Straw Hats are stopped at the shore by the cute – but formidable – Kung Fu Dugongs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Erumalu, the City of Green and the Kung Fu Dugongs!

programme.title: Luffy’s crew encounters treacherous birds and man-eating foliage on its desert odyssey, and just when they think the coast is clear, a great disturbance emerges from beneath the sand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Monsters that Live in the Scorching Land!

programme.title: The Straw Hats cross paths with the Barbar Sand Pirates, and Ace runs into big trouble when he gets separated from the group.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!

programme.title: Princess Vivi devises a plan to test the hearts of a gang of so-called rebels. They talk a good game, but will their bite measure up to their bark?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their journey to Yuba, where a bittersweet reunion with a childhood friend awaits Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Warrior Koza! The Dream vowed to Vivi!

programme.title: Fire Fist Ace is hired by two young boys to hunt down and capture a lethal bounty hunter known only as the Scorpion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in a Heat Haze! Ace vs. the Gallant Scorpion!

programme.title: Chopper, Zoro, and Luffy get separated from the others. When the heat makes Luffy act even stranger than usual, his friends wonder if they joined the right pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ruins and Lost Ways! Vivi, Her Friends and the Country's Form!

programme.title: The assassins of Baroque Works gather at Spider’s Café, and the Straw Hats arrive at Yuba only to find it buried in sand.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spiders Caf? at 8 o'Clock! The Enemy Leaders Gather!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals himself to the Baroque Works assassins and discloses his dastardly plan for Alabasta. After departing Yuba, Luffy takes a stand that forces Vivi to rethink her mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line

programme.title: Vivi takes Luffy’s advice, and the Straw Hats head towards Rainbase for a confrontation with Crocodile. Karoo finally reaches the palace with Vivi’s warning for King Cobra.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battlefront of Alabasta! Rainbase, the City of Dreams

programme.title: Luffy leads a daring – but foolish – raid on Crocodile’s casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker – and more importantly, leaves Vivi unprotected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are stuck in the clink, King Cobra addresses the starving people of Nanohana. Will his unbelievable revelation drive his subjects past the brink of rebellion?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!

programme.title: A royal imposter has the rebel army hell-bent on bringing Cobra’s reign to a violent end. Meanwhile, Luffy and his mates find themselves in deep trouble and even deeper water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!

programme.title: Sanji shows up in the nick of time to make the crocs cough up the key to Luffy’s freedom, but the ravenous reptiles spit up something else instead.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!

programme.title: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffy’s not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile

programme.title: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land

programme.title: Vivi arrives in Alubarna with just enough time to stop the rebellion, but the agents of Baroque Works lurk in every corner, waiting to sabotage her plans for peace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna

programme.title: Sanji buys Vivi some time by mixing it up with a foe of many faces. Outside Alubarna’s walls, Chopper and Usopp tangle with Miss Merry Christmas and her slugging sidekick.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo

programme.title: Usopp finally shows some courage by using a five-ton hammer to play whack-a-mole with Miss Merry Christmas. He may be bluffing, but the distraction lets Chopper zero in on the enemy’s weakness.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4

programme.title: Chopper’s Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 1)

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 2)

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Gamer, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Set in a future world where humans can control other humans in mass-scale, multi-player online gaming environments, a star player (Butler) from a game called 'Slayers' looks to regain his independence while taking down the game's mastermind (Hall).

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: McLintock!, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintock’s ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen O’Hara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Fort Massacre, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: The Broken Star, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A marshal murders a rancher for gold, but is foiled by his assistant.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum portrays an Exterminator--in the American West. He will, for a price, eliminate any outlaws annoying the peace of any Western town. When his wife, in disgust, leaves him, he pursues her, only to encounter his greatest gunfighting challenge.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Identity, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: What if every choice we ever make was already made for us? What if there really were no coincidences in life and our destinies were already predetermined? Ten strangers with secrets are brought together in a savage rainstorm. Rated: R

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: After a minor success, two members of the group are taken hostage; Carol struggles morally with the lengths she has gone to survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

programme.title: To save one of their own, Rick's group must venture outside the walls; their experience changes their lives forever.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: As the members of the group remain helpless, Negan takes action that will forever haunt those who survive.

programme.sub-title: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be

programme.title: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.

programme.title: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.

programme.title: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.

programme.title: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.

programme.title: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.

programme.title: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.

programme.title: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.

programme.title: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the school’s smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
